original_text: I have seen slaves on horses, and princes walking on the ground like slaves.
korean_text: 또 내가 보았노니 종들은 말을 타고 고관들은 종들처럼 땅에 걸어 다니는도다

sentences.original_text: I have seen slaves on horses
and princes walking on the ground like slaves
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 고관들은 종처럼 땅을 걷고 있었다
